fullplot: With problems appearing between FBI agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully, a dangerous conspiracy is starting to appear. A deadly virus, which appears to be of extraterrestrial origin has appeared, which could destroy all life on Earth. With the help of a paranoid doctor, Alvin Kurtzweil, Mulder and Scully must act fast in order to save everyone on the planet.
plot: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.
title: The X Files

tomatoes.consensus: Results may vary for newcomers, but fans of the series will enjoy its big-screen transition.
